1138780.name: RotoBrix
1138780.description:
Dive Into the Addictive World of RotoBrix!
Get ready for the ultimate puzzle game mashup that will test your reflexes, strategy, and nerves! RotoBrix combines the best of falling-blocks gameplay with match-3 mechanics, creating an electrifying challenge where every move counts. Match, stack, and survive—before the Brix overwhelm the playfield!

How Far Can You Go?
Rotate and slide your falling stacks of three Brix to set up matches and score big. Line up three or more Brix to clear them, reduce your Brix Left counter, and climb to the next level. Every five levels unlock a new stage, each with exciting twists: fresh Brix types, powerful abilities, and new challenges.

Unleash Powerful Abilities!
Think you’ve mastered matching? Step up your game! Match four or more Brix in one move to unlock abilities that can turn the tide:

  • Bomb: An explosive solution to clear the clutter—obliterate blocks in one massive blast!

  • Hourglass: Slow down time and plan your next move with precision.

  • Randomizer: Shake up the field by scrambling block colors.

But beware—higher stages introduce carbon fiber Brix that can’t be matched, forcing you to rethink your strategies. Only bombs can save you from the chaos!

Why You'll Love RotoBrix

  • Four difficulty levels: Whether you're a casual gamer or a hardcore puzzle fan, there's a challenge waiting for you.

  • Stage Select: Start right where you left off without replaying earlier stages.

  • Color Blind Mode: Play with added symbols for accessibility or a fresh visual style.

  • Epic highscores: Climb the leaderboard and immortalize your best runs!

  • Stunning aesthetics: Dozens of animated backgrounds and an energetic electronic soundtrack will keep you immersed.

Bigger Scores, Bigger Bragging Rights
Crank up the difficulty for faster gameplay and sky-high scores. And with each stage, the stakes rise: faster falling blocks, crazier combos, and bigger rewards!

Ready to master the chaos?
Play your way, match your heart out, and claim your spot as a RotoBrix legend. It’s a game you won’t be able to put down!
